laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for both IgM and IgG.
Showed non-necrotizing granulomata with abundant coccidioidal spherules.
Demonstrated signiﬁcantly reduced production of IFN-γ after stimulation with PHA and failure to augment production in response to PHA with IL-12.
Confirmed homozygous 557G>A transition, resulting in a cysteine to tyrosine substitution at amino acid position 186 (C186Y).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Detection of IL-12Rβ1 on cell surface
laboratory_examinations.findings: Patient 1's cells failed to express IL-12Rβ1 on the cell surface.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Phosphorylation of signal transducer and activator of transcription–4 (STAT4)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Absence of phosphorylation in lymphocytes from patient 1 at the same IL-12 doses used in previous tests.
Demonstrated the same homozygous mutation as that in patient 1.
